channel.title: Admin Spawning

item.title: Admin Spawning
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Im pretty sure you probably have the item command under the ‘public void ownerCommands’ so just copy that one and paste it under ‘public void administratorCommands’ and is should let admins spawn.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin Spawning
item.dc:creator: @Josephx Josephx
item.description:
@Josephx wrote:

Hey I need it so my admins can spawn with an insidiax source. I’ve tried a few codes and all gave cmpiling errors here is my (“item”) in commands.java

if(playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)){
try{
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" “);
if (args.length == 3){
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0){
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
}else{
c.sendMessage(”<shad=500500500>That item ID does not exist.");
}
}else{
c.sendMessage("<shad=500500500>Wrong usage: Try <shad=500500500>::item 995 1 (::item_ID_Amount)");
}
}catch(Exception e){
}
}

Read full topic
